metadata.Name: PIAF
metadata.Description: A native French Question Answering dataset created via a participatory effort. It contains question-answer pairs where answers are text spans from French Wikipedia articles. An open-source annotation tool was also developed for its collection.
metadata.Paper Title: Project PIAF: Building a Native French Question-Answering Dataset
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of The 12th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference
metadata.Venue Name: The 12th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference
Affiliations: Etalab, DINUM, Prime Minister's Office, Paris (France)
Sorbonne Université, CNRS, LIP6, F-75005 Paris, France
metadata.Abstract: Motivated by the lack of data for non-English languages, in particular for the evaluation of downstream tasks such as Question Answering, we present a participatory effort to collect a native French Question Answering Dataset. Furthermore, we describe and publicly release the annotation tool developed for our collection effort, along with the data obtained and preliminary baselines.
